results.title: 公司简介-菲斯特屏幕 - Fscreen
results.content: 企业介绍成都菲斯特科技有限公司（简称：菲斯特科技），创立于1999年。是一家拥有原创技术、核心专利能力，从产品设计、模具开发、生产制造全产业链覆盖的投影显示科技企业。菲斯特科技成立至今，始终专注光学技术的研究、开发及产业化，截至目前已经拥有超短焦激光电视菲涅尔光学屏 ...
results.raw_content:
公司简介
关于我们
企业介绍
成都菲斯特科技有限公司（简称：菲斯特科技），创立于1999年。是一家拥有原创技术、核心专利能力，从产品设计、模具开发、生产制造全产业链覆盖的投影显示科技企业。
菲斯特科技成立至今，始终专注于家用大屏显示与光学器件的研发与应用。公司主要产品有：菲涅尔光学投影屏幕、超大尺寸菲涅尔透镜、功能光学膜材、裸眼3D光栅、超精密模具加工、光学设计与仿真、特殊光学产品等。产品被应用于科研、商用（影院、展览展示、虚拟仿真、教育等）、家用等多个领域。
作为激光及投影显示行业重要的上游企业，菲斯特科技与众多行业知名品牌和科研机构开展深度合作，并打造了集研、产、销一体的服务体系。目前已在成都高新西区建立光电产业园区，已拥有50万片菲涅尔投影屏产能基地，并设立超大尺寸超精密制造创新平台，园区内拥有3万平米医疗级净化厂房，多条智能化流水作业线，为整个激光及投影显示行业的规模化提供了完备的科研及产能体系。
我们不断开拓进取，为推动中国激光及投影显示行业的生态建设与发展，为消费者提供“适合全家居应用场景的影音方案”。
菲斯特科技，用光学技术，让“缤纷世界，完美再现”！
品牌历史
菲斯特科技创立之初，背投影屏幕技术长期被国外垄断，故创始人张益民先生将品牌取名“菲斯特”，源自于对“First”的音译，并取得注册商标“FSCREEN”，来自“First Screen”的组合，寓意着对“第一屏幕”这个目标的追求。
菲斯特带着将民族品牌领入国际的决心，开启了创新之路。
自成立以来，菲斯特始终专注光学相关技术的研究、开发及产业化。菲斯特科技在光学设计、高分子材料、超大尺寸超精密加工模具、超精密成型工艺与设备制造方面，成功打破以往“引进、消化、吸收”的发展模式，在没有学习样本、没有现成技术、没有设备引进的艰难状况下，披荆斩棘，凭借自主创新，建立起自主、独立、完整的核心技术体系。
2000年，菲斯特科技推出120寸菲涅尔背投菲涅尔屏，填补国内空白。该屏幕产品广泛应用于大尺寸拼接投影显示系统，成为投影显示领域当之无愧的高性能投影屏幕指引者。
2013年，随着投影显示技术的进步，激光电视应运而生。菲斯特科技基于在光学领域的长期耕耘与深厚的技术积累，针对超短焦激光电视而专门设计了一款菲涅尔投影屏。
2015年，菲斯特100寸超短焦激光电视菲涅尔硬屏亮相北京国家会议中心的国际多媒体视听集成展（Infocomm Asia）。此产品的各项性能达到了当时国外同类产品的先进指标，填补了国内空白，受到国内外行业人士的广泛关注，成为我国激光电视产业发展史中具有里程碑意义的重大事件。
2018年，菲斯特科技成功将短焦激光电视上的菲涅尔光学技术应用到智能投影领域，创新研发了中长焦菲涅尔投影屏，此产品突破了超大超薄的柔性可弯曲屏幕的平整性的瓶颈制约，多项指标达到国际领先水平。
2019年，菲斯特科技所生产销售的超短焦激光电视菲涅尔投影屏，正式超越行业巨头日本DNP，一跃成为国内外超短焦激光电视菲涅尔投影屏市占率第一的企业。
2020年，菲斯特科技再次实现跨越式的创新技术应用，在国际领先水平的大尺寸菲涅尔透镜技术加持下，公司投影屏幕类产品全面适配三色激光显示技术，为激光显示行业迈向三色光源时代作出了重要贡献。
2021年，菲斯特科技不断突破菲涅尔光学屏的尺寸边界，实现了菲涅尔投影屏的120寸超大尺寸应用，为激光显示大屏化的场景方向奠定了坚实的基础。
2023年，菲斯特科技发布三色菲涅尔智能投影屏幕，兼容多种光源技术，助推投影显示进入三色时代。
菲斯特科技，22年风雨历程，不忘初心，奋勇前行，我们一直在路上。
4008-520-201

results.raw_content:
Fscreen-Fresnel ALR Projection Screen
Audio and Video Equipment Manufacturing
Chengdu, Sichuan
819 followers
About us
Founded in 1999, Fscreen is a professional projection display company with core patent and independent technology,which involving product design, mold development, production and manufacturing of the whole industry chain.
Since its establishment, Fscreen has always focused on the optical technology R&D and industrialization. Until now, it has owned a number of technical products related to the optical field, such as UST Fresnel laser TV optical screen,LT Fresnel projection optical screen,optical functional film,ultra precision roller mould processing and extra-large size Fresnel lens customization. All of the products has been applied in scientific research,
commercial (cinema, command and dispatch, exhibition, virtual simulation, education, etc.), household and other fields.
As a famous screen company in China, Fscreen has carried out in-depth cooperation with many well-known brands and scientific research institutions in the world, and created a service system integrating research, production and marketing.
Now, we have established Fscreen photoelectric industry science and technology park in Chengdu Western Hi-tech district, which has ability to produce 500,000 pieces optical screen every year, and we also set up extra-large ultra-precision manufacturing innovation platform.
The whole park with 30,000 square meters medical grade purification plant, multiple intelligent assembly line, and for the laser projection display industry scale provides a complete system of scientific research and production capacity.
In 2022,Fscreen aims to provide the highest quality Fresnel optical projection screens with the most comprehensive range of products. Our target is committed to making projection display as the best display, promote the ecological construction and development of laser cast and projection display industry, try our best to provide consumers with "suitable for all family application scenario of audio and video solutions".
Colorful World,Fscreen

Company Profile
Founded in 1999, Fscreen is a professional projection display company with core patent and independent technology, which involving product design, mold development, production and manufacturing of the whole industry chain. Since its establishment, Fscreen has always focused on the optical technology R&D and industrialization. Until now, it has owned a number of technical products related to the optical field, such as UST Fresnel laser TV optical screen, LT Fresnel projection optical screen, optical functional film, ultra precision roller mould processing and extra-large size Fresnel lens customization. All of the products has been applied in scientific research, commercial (cinema, exhibition, virtual simulation, education, etc. ), household and other fields. As a famous screen company in China, Fscreen has carried out in-depth cooperation with many well-known brands and scientific research institutions in the world, and created a service system integrating research, production and marketing. Now, we have established Fscreen photoelectric industry science and technology park in Chengdu Western Hi-tech district, which has ability to produce 500, 000 pieces optical screen every year, and we also set up extra-large ultra-precision manufacturing innovation platform. The whole park with 30, 000 square meters medical grade purification plant, multiple intelligent assembly line, and for the laser projection display industry scale provides a complete system of scientific research and production capacity. In 2022, Fscreen aims to provide the highest quality Fresnel optical projection screens with the most comprehensive range of products. Our target is committed to making projection display as the best display, promote the ecological construction and development of laser cast and projection display industry, try our best to provide consumers with "suitable for all family application scenario of audio and video solutions"
